Reviews.Title: Nice looking ok job recording but broke in just three months..
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: These are nice looking and do a good job of recording. I installed them under my overhang of my house out of the weather. They both failed within 3 months. The camera power cord failed along with the camera on both. I did get one sent back and took me 3 weeks just to get there customer service on the line. When you return this junk do so on the website. You do have to pay for the shipping it to SVAT.  I paid good money for these cameras and am so disappointed. The real kicker was they sent me a new one but didn't even tell me what was wrong with the first one I returned. This manufacture need a lesson it customer service. Buy one with great reviews only.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Joseph F Benedict
Reviews.Content: Product worked well and easy to use.i would recamend it to a friend.the price was right . And it was shipped on time.

Reviews.Title: A camera that has it all
Reviews.Author: Jayne
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as a gift, but it seems to be the only one on the market that had all the features I was looking for. The wireless system is so convenient, and using it is super simple thanks to the "plug and play" design. The night vision on the camera was also highly rated. This is a high-quality brand and device for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Working as planned
Reviews.Author: Marcus Woodrum
Reviews.Content: It is working as hoped wish it transmitted farther than it does. I also wish it had a battery backup as well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Setup in seconds with digital wireless technology for clear video and audio
Record up to 350 minutes of video and audio on the included 2GB SD card
Long range night vision camera allows you to see up to 40ft in the dark
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT GX301-012 Digital Wireless DVR Security System Receiver with SD Card Recording and Long Range Night Vision Surveillance Camera
